sense.def:
To etch a design or pattern on a surface
pomeni vrezati neko risbo ali vzorec v neko površino z ostrim orodjem.

seg.quote: The artists must have spent many hours etching the images on the walls.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
etched on someone's memory
, to pomeni, da je na človeka naredilo močan vtis.

seg.quote: His face will remain permanently etched on my memory.
